black.content: ______ will always get you laid in Toronto

I never met a ______ I didn't like
I picked up ______ on the night bus

What you do not want to see when the subway doors open?

white: A drunk girl getting banged on a pile of garbage bags

a purse stashed with condoms and dental dams
